summary: This class manages an offline pipeline that integrates automatic speech recognition with speaker diarization. It reads configuration settings, performs voice activity detection, runs diarization to assign speaker labels, decodes speech, optionally refines word timestamps using VAD and a language model, and outputs speaker‑attributed transcripts in JSON and CSV formats.
business_intent: Provide a turnkey solution for automatically generating speaker‑segmented transcripts from audio recordings, supporting analytics, compliance, and archival needs without requiring real‑time processing.
